lessons.title: Introduction
lessons.content:
JavaScript is the most popular programming language in the world.
JavaScript is a programming language used to make web pages interactive.
JavaScript, often abbreviated to JS, is the default language of the internet. But it doesnâ€™t stop there, JavaScript powers your smart tv, works with the internet of things, and helps build cross platform apps.

lessons.title: Variables
lessons.content: Variables are used to store data in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Strings
lessons.content: Strings are sequences of characters enclosed in quotes.
